timeline.message:
Fixed Editor Search in UNDO

Signed-off-by: Christian Dietrich <christian.dietrich@itemis.de>

timeline.bodyText: am not sure if activate should be true
timeline.author: cdietrich

replies.bodyText: I think activate==true is correct here since we want to provide some context for the user.
replies.author: szarnekow

replies.bodyText:
if you have mutile editors then searching needs to be done on input and id to get the text editor here and not the editor on the same/file input only

I see. Makes sense. It's a side effect of not properly using the right document type. Good catch.
